title: Trying to figure out what font this is
content:
I’m trying to figure out what typeface was used for the BROWNS text.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003502im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/browns_scroll_03_4856.jpg)

 [‹ (x) fat rounded stencil sans on T-shirt by Build - Beans {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003502/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34175 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need Help Identifying Type Face ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003502/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41151 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jay81

comments.content: Yup that looks about right and if not it’s pretty darn close...Thanks!

Think it’s called ’Giza’ from Font Bureau - it’s cool, comes in 16 styles!  
not positive, they’re both pretty similar on those characters...

This is indeed [Giza](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003502/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/giza_seven_five/?sample_text=BROWNS&sample_size=72&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1).

The sans is [Garage Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003502/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/garage_gothic_regular/?sample_text=MEMORABLE%20MOMENTS&sample_size=60&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1).
Interesting...the two fonts are so close but now that I examine both I am noticing the differences and yes it is indeed Giza. Thanks for all the help guys.
